title: Eikoku Koi Monogatari Emma: Molders-hen
title_en: Emma: A Victorian Romance Second Act
title_jp: 英國戀物語エマ ～メルダース編～
synopsis: In the faraway village of Haworth, a new chapter in Emma's life has begun. Now employed by the wealthy Molders family, Emma has resolved to put the past behind her. She'll have to adjust to a new house, a charming (but eccentric) new mistress, and a host of fellow servants, some with buried pasts of their own.
